project1.projectDescription: An implementation of the Gameplay Ability System for a Shooter Game taking the best practices exposed in Lyra Starter Game.
coreFeatures: Character Animation and State Machines, including layered animation with Lyra Animation Set
Audio integration with Meta Sound and custom audio effects for doors, weapons, and explosions
Enhanced Input integration with GAS for dynamic gameplay controls
Comprehensive gameplay mechanics for shooter-based interactions

design.description: Focused on achieving immersive sci-fi environments with modular and dynamically generated assets, alongside responsive, player-centered animations and audio cues.

result.description: Demonstrates advanced shooter gameplay mechanics with smooth animation transitions, responsive audio, and procedurally generated environments to enhance replayability.
